raid_level.description: RAID level for the logical disk. Required.

size_gb.description: Size (Integer) for the logical disk. Required.

volume_name.description: Name of the volume to be created. Optional.

is_root_volume.description: Specifies whether this disk is a root volume. Optional.

share_physical_disks.description: Specifies whether other logical disks can share physical disks with this logical disk. Optional.

disk_type.description: Specifies the type of disk preferred. Valid values are 'hdd' and 'ssd'. Optional.

interface_type.description: Specifies the interface type of disk. Valid values are 'sata', 'scsi' and 'sas'. Optional.

number_of_physical_disks.description: Number of physical disks to use for this logical disk. Optional.

controller.description: Controller to use for this logical disk. Optional.

physical_disks.description: The physical disks to use for this logical disk. Optional
